Dressing: ½ tablespoon mustard sauce, black pepper
½ cup light olive oil or canola oil

Preparation: Make the dressing: In a small bowl
whisk together the olive oil
vinegar
garlic
oregano
mustard
salt
and several grinds of pepper.
Add the cucumber
green pepper
cherry tomatoes
feta cheese
red onions
and olives in the bowl.
Drizzle with the dressing and very gently toss. Sprinkle with oregano and garnish with mint leaves. Seasoning can be added according to taste.
ingredient: One bowl cut feta cheese cubes (paneer is a substitute)
⅓ cup thinly sliced red onion

Preparation: Wash and cut the veggies into small pieces.
Prepare the dressing by mixing all the ingredients well.
Chop or tear the lettuce leaves into bite sized pieces.
Mix the above. Add the boiled pasta and toss gently Serve in a bowl and sprinkle seasonings according to taste.
ingredient: (Onions/ tomatoes/ bell peppers can be added if preferred)
Dressing: Spices (black pepper, oregano, Salt) according to taste
Tip: You can also drizzle fat-free mayonnaise.

Preparation: Spread some butter and mayonnaise on one of the slice of bread and add cheese slice on top.
On the other slice of bread, add the lettuce, Italian basil and chopped cherry tomatoes.
Also add the onions and the spices.
Combine both of the slices and serve with your favourite dressing sauce.
Tip: Toasting the bread gives it extra crunchiness.
ingredient: 1 cheese slice or grated cheese or paneer/tofu optional)
Spices (black pepper, oregano, salt, red chilli flakes) according to taste

Preparation: Blend basil leaves, nuts, cheese, garlic and black pepper together.
Drizzle some olive oil and continue blending, to make purée.
Take a pan and drizzle some olive oil on it. Sauté the garlic until yellow.
Pour the boiled pasta. When the pasta starts sticking to the pan, add the pasta water.
When the garlic turns golden brown, take it off the stove and pour it in to the pesto sauce.
Serve in a bowl and garnish with the cherry tomato or Parmesan.
ingredient: 2 cups boiled pasta/ spaghetti (save around 1-2 teaspoons of the pasta water for later)

Preparation: Place the lemons, and ginger in a large pitcher.
Rub the basil leaves between your hands and add to the pitcher.
Add the drinking water and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Flavours will release into the water.
Serve over ice with some pieces of cucumber.
ingredient: Few slices of Lemon, One piece of ginger

Preparation: Cut chillies, onion and separate pakchoy leaves.
Place besan in a bowl. Pour buttermilk, salt, and mix well.
Pour oil in the pan and Add mustard seeds, cumin and let them fry.
Add curry leaves, ginger garlic paste.
Then add turmeric powder.
Now add chilies, onion, tomato and pakchoy.
Cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add buttermilk and besan mix. Let it boil in medium high.
Once boiled, turn off.
Garnish with parsley or dhaniya.
Wash and soak the rice in water for about 30 minutes and drain the extra water.
Soak the cashews in water for later Take oil (olive will be healthier) and add cumin seeds, green chillies, ginger, garlic.
Slowly add chopped onion and sauté.
Now add the chopped vegetables (except lettuce), spices and stir fry.
Add the boiled rice mixed with the baby spinach paste and chopped mint leaves Serve in a large bowl with crispy lettuce, cherry tomatoes and garnish with the cashews.
ingredient: 5-6 finely chopped garlic cloves, Onions, Fresh beans, Green peas
